directions.step:
Put apple pie filling in a large 13-inch pie dish. Pour the water on apples. Sift the cake mix over the entire pie. Melt butter & pour over all. Cover with chopped pecans. Bake at 350 for 1 hour. (You may use any type pie filling you wish & substitute a white cake mix.) (Tester's note: I added 1/2 cup brown sugar & 2 teaspoons cinnamon on top of pie filling & served warm with ice cream.)
ANNA MAE COOKE
From <Simply Southern>, the Desoto School Mothers' Assn, Helena-West Helena, AR 72390. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
